ygData.subject: Seraph and Payment Problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Seraph, I can understand how it feels to put all your effort into EQ and now face the prospect of losing it all. And since i think you re a nice guy/gal (heh)
ygData.messageBody:
Seraph,

I can understand how it feels to put all your effort into EQ and now face the prospect of losing it all.
And since i think you're a nice guy/gal (heh) who helps ppl out and all that...i'm willing to help you here.

However, i do first want to know how i can help you with my credit card. You have to enter the number right?
After all, much as i think you're a nice guy, money is still money and credit card numbers are dangerous
to pass around =) I'm sure everyone can understand that.

I delete all msgs upon reading and so forgot to keep that email add of yours... so here's mine

hannibal@...

Email me and we'll discuss this further.

Synzzz aka Zanderion
